steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Design' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Page Background' section, click on 'Watermark'.
Select 'Custom Watermark' from the dropdown menu.
In the 'Printed Watermark' dialog box, select 'Text watermark'.
Choose the desired font, size, color, and layout for the watermark.
Click 'OK' to apply the watermark to the document.
